7596.quoteText: Any failure of Forbes to enforce or exercise any provision of this Agreement or related right shall not constitute a waiver of that right or provision.
7596.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

tosdr.case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

7597.quoteText: Any cause of action or claim you may have with respect to the Website must be commenced within one (1) year after the claim or cause of action arises or such claim or cause of action is barred.
7597.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

tosdr.case: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

7598.quoteText:
Modification <dl>
<dt>11.1</dt>
<dd>Forbes shall have the right, at its discretion, to change, modify, add or remove terms of this agreement at any time without notice.
7598.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

9976.quoteText:
We partner with a third party ad network to either display advertising on our Web site or to manage our advertising on other sites. Our ad network partner uses cookies and Web beacons to collect non-personally identifiable information about your activities on this and other Web sites to provide you targeted advertising based upon your interests.

If you wish to not have this information used for the purpose of serving you targeted ads, you may opt-out or modify your choices by clicking here, or if located in the European Union by clicking here
9976.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

9977.quoteText:
In the Event of Sale or Bankruptcy

The ownership of the Site may change at some point in the future. Should that occur, we want this site to be able to maintain a relationship with you. In the event of a sale, merger, public offering, bankruptcy or other change in control of Forbes, your information may be shared with the person or business that owns or controls this site.
9977.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

9978.quoteText: You may also provide information to Forbes in other contexts, including, for example, on your member profile page and public profile URL, to enter into a sweepstakes, contest, or promotion, or to apply for consideration in connection with a Forbes list or similar accolade (e.g., Under 30 list applications).
9978.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

tosdr.case: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

9979.quoteText: Therefore, we reserve the right to remove any content posted on the Website or Other Channels at any time for any reason without notice.
9979.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
